column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Eska says : " Father , have n't the spirits had ten thousand years to open this portal ? "
#Text=Desna says : " If they could not succeed , what makes you think we will ? "
#Text=Unalaq says : " By entering the Spirit World through the portal , we bring with us something the spirits never had : our bending .
#Text=" Unalaq says : " Leave him !
#Text=Keep bending !
#Text=" Eska says : " He needs a healer at once !
#Text=" Unalaq says : " This is more important !
#Text=" Eska says : " I 'm taking him back .
#Text=" Varrick says : " I hear you 've got some ideas .
#Text=You wan na tell me about them ?
#Text=" Mako says : " Go ahead .
#Text=Torture me all you want .
#Text=I 'm not gon na talk .
#Text=" Varrick says : " Torture ?
#Text=The only thing I want to torture is this pesky foot fungus .
#Text=Ah !
#Text=Eee !
#Text=Ooh !
#Text=The burning means it 's working .
#Text=I heard you 've been investigating the recent attacks on my ships , and I think you know that I know that you know , you know ?
#Text=" Mako says : " Know what ?
#Text=" Varrick says : " That the world is a dangerous place , and that 's exactly why I want to offer you a job on my security force .
#Text=" Mako says : " I have a job .
#Text=" Varrick says : " We need you .
#Text=Me , Asami , Bolin .
#Text=We 're all in the same team here .
#Text=We want you to join us .
#Text=You would n't want anything to happen to Asami , would you ?
#Text=I mean , I heard you and her were kind of , uh , an item again .
#Text=Or what about your brother ?
#Text=" Mako says : " What are you saying ?
#Text=" Varrick says : " I 'm saying I want your help to protect them .
#Text=Without you , who knows what could happen .
#Text=" Mako says : " Thanks for your concern , but the answer is no .
#Text=" Bumi says : " Oh , you are just so cute .
#Text=I 'm going to name you Bum - Ju .
#Text=It 's short for " Bumi Junior " .
#Text=Do n't you think he looks like me ?
#Text=" Tenzin says : " The resemblance is uncanny .
#Text=" Jinora says : " I think Dad 's mad at me .
#Text=" Kya says : " Your father 's not mad .
#Text=His pride 's just a little bruised since he is n't able to see spirits like you .
#Text=" Korra says : " You have a natural gift .
#Text=That 's pretty lucky .
#Text=" Jinora says : " You 're the lucky one .
#Text=You actually got to meet the first Avatar .
#Text=I know about a lot of Avatars , but I do n't know anything about him .
#Text=Is it even a him ?
#Text=Or is it her ?
#Text=" Korra says : " It 's a him , Avatar Wan .
#Text=He was amazing .
#Text=I saw how he became the first Avatar by fusing with Raava , the Spirit of Light .
#Text=" Jinora says : " The Avatar is part spirit ?
#Text=Of course !
#Text=Just like the statue .
#Text=" Kya says : " What statue ?
#Text=" Jinora says : " When we were at the Southern Air Temple , I was drawn to this old carving .
#Text=I could n't figure out what it was until now .
#Text=It was the first Avatar .
#Text=" Korra says : " When did this happen ?
#Text=" Jinora says : " It was on the solstice .
#Text=" Korra says : " That 's the day I opened the Southern portal .
#Text=" Korra and Jinora says : " Whoa .
#Text=" Bumi says : " We 're here !
#Text=" Tenzin says : " Are you sure these spirits are leading us into the right place ?
#Text=" Bumi says : " Of course !
#Text=I trust Bum - Ju with my life .
#Text=" Korra says : " Look .
#Text=There are carvings on them .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " This is an ancient airbender meditation circle .
#Text=" Jinora says : " There 's a lot of spiritual energy in this place , but it feels really strange .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " We 'll have to perform a spiritual cleansing ceremony .
#Text=" Bumi says : " What are you talking about ?
#Text=" Tenzin says : " Dad taught it to me .
#Text=This site has been neglected for many years .
#Text=A cleansing ceremony will help strengthen its connections to the Spirit World .
#Text=" Bumi says : " Good job , you cleansed the area of the only spirits that want to help us , and you scared away Bum - Ju .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " It 's working .
#Text=" Bumi says : " Ah !
#Text=Bats !
#Text=Evil bats !
#Text=" Korra says : " Not bats .
#Text=Dark spirits .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " What are we supposed to do ?
#Text=" Kya says : " Amazing .
#Text="
